medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began 2 years earlier and resolved over the subsequent weeks after initial presentation. However, 3 months before presentation to the advanced heart failure center, he experienced a gradual onset of progressive dyspnea on exertion. At the presentation, he noted dyspnea with showering and dressing, and required to sleep in a recliner due to orthopnea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prostate cancer status after radical prostatectomy 5 years earlier.
medical_history.social_history: The patient quit smoking 10 years ago, does not drink alcohol, and has never used illicit drugs. He works as a financial analyst and lives with his wife of 38 years. They have 1 son who lives nearby.
